title: Why block system is not effective being on the  same Club...! fix it please...
body: If i block any player ...how he can see my profile and watch my gameplay by being in a same club ..? please solve this problem ...coz this is annoying...:3

replies.body: why i have to leave my club..? it is not the system of blocking...!!! then disable ur block system...

I suggest leaving the club if you're encountering issues with the members in it. Because the club is a social environment, features such as profile viewing and game spectating are enabled. 

If you'd rather suggest this work different, regarding blocking a player and their ability to take those actions, I recommend posting on the [Miscellaneous boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous). Let me know if you have any other questions.
